All refugees seeking to enter the U: S. must pass a more rigorous screening than anyone else allowed into the country.
Syrian refugees are subjected to special: enhanced review" by the Department of Homeland Security.
The U: S. State Department states that all refugees are subject to the highest level of security checks of any category of traveler to the country.
The process of vetting refugees includes: the National Counterterrorism Center, and the Department of Homeland Security.
